= Introduction =
This page explains how to install customwars

== Installing ==
  * Unpack the downloaded zip file to $install_dir, where install_dir can be any dir you choose for example: (c:/program files/CW2/)

The next steps are different for each OS:

Windows:
  * go to the $install_dir and double click on CustomWars.bat to launch the game

Linux/mac: 
  * open up a cmd and cd to the $install_dir copy the java line from CustomWars.bat to the cmd and press enter

Requirements:
java 1.6+
